pageProps.readme:
bradtaniguchi-dev

This repo represents my portfolio/blog site that is hosted on github-pages.

This repo will be updated to replace the current one at: https://github.com/bradtaniguchi/bradtaniguchi.github.io

Which uses a custom domain at: https://bradtaniguchi.dev/

Before the migration away from the older page, this repo is available here: https://bradtaniguchi.dev/bradtaniguchi-dev/

Project road-map

roadmap

License

MIT

commits.message: Update bottom padding on main page by ~30%

Increased bottom padding

- see if this helps with mobile issues seen

Related #107

issue.title: [Bug] All links away from main page don't work

labels.name: realm:UI/UX
labels.description: Issue representing changes to the UI/UX

issue.body:
**Describe the bug**

These links take you to the current portfolio. Might be easier to switch over, rather than fix this directly though.

comment.body: Fix could be to add a temporary "relLink" component that dynamically manages the link based on a base URL that should be set globally or dynamically. Not sure if this would mess up the Link component or not though.

issue.title: [Bug] Fix layout issue on the bottom of the page
issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
There seems to be a margin issue at the bottom, where not everything is shown on all pages

issue.title: [Feature] Add "show more" button to the bottom of the activity list
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
The activity list on the main page should only show the last 5 events. The rest should only be shown once the user clicks on a "show-more" button that is centered

issue.title: [Chore] Look into sourcemap warning during export
issue.body:
**What needs to be done**

see:
```
warn  - In order to be able to deminify errors, @sentry/nextjs creates sourcemaps and uploads them to the Sentry server. Depending on your deployment setup, this means your original code may be visible in browser devtools in production. To prevent this, set hideSourceMaps to true in the sentry options in your next.config.js. To disable this warning without changing sourcemap behavior, set hideSourceMaps to false. (In @sentry/nextjs version 8.0.0 and beyond, this option will default to true.) See https://webpack.js.org/configuration/devtool/ and https://docs.sentry.io/platforms/javascript/guides/nextjs/manual-setup/#use-hidden-source-map for more information.
```

issue.title: [Bug] Clean up storybook deployment
issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
Only the "storybook landing" component is rendered, but its currently crashing. 

Optionally this could be 100% removed completely as this wont be used much or at all for this project.
